question: [Explain] Espanol: Di which integer bin occurs most frequently segun el histograma.

qas.question: [Explain] Espanol: Di which integer bin occurs most frequently segun el histograma.
[Explain] Deutsch: Gib how many samples were used in total anhand des Histogramms an.
[Note] Norsk: Oppgi how many entries fall inside the modal bin basert pa histogrammet.
